mapper.select: SELECT pd.iidCode ,pd.hospitalId ,pd.patientId ,pd.liContent ,pd.iUrl ,pd.idName ,pd.pDoctor ,pd.ifdTime ,pd.iliDate ,pd.adminId ,pd.iidrDate ,pit.pName FROM pandog pd JOIN patient pit ON pd.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND pd.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE pd.patientId = 'patientId01'
